verses.verse: Moreover, <S%G1161><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> we do <S%G1107><s%> you to wit <S%G1107><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> bestowed <S%G1325><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Macedonia; <S%G3109><s%>

And this they did, not as we hoped, <S%G1679><s%> but first <S%G4412><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> their own selves <S%G1438><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and to us by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

So <S%G1519><s%> that we desired <S%G3870><s%> Titus, <S%G5103><s%> that as he had begun, <S%G4278><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> he would also <S%G2532><s%> finish <S%G2005><s%> in you the same <S%G846><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> not by commandment, <S%G2003><s%> but by occasion <S%G1223><s%> of the forwardness <S%G4710><s%> of others, <S%G2087><s%> and to prove <S%G1381><s%> the sincerity <S%G1103><s%> of your <S%G5212><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

For you know <S%G1097><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that, though he was rich, <S%G4145><s%> yet for your <S%G5216><s%> sakes he became <S%G4433><s%> poor, <S%G4433><s%> that you through his poverty <S%G4432><s%> might be rich. <S%G4147><s%>

And herein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> my advice: <S%G1106><s%> for this <S%G5124><s%> is expedient <S%G4851><s%> for you, who <S%G3748><s%> have begun <S%G4278><s%> before, <S%G4278><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> to do, <S%G4160><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> to be forward <S%G2309><s%> a year <S%G4070><s%> ago. <S%G575><s%>

Now <S%G3570><s%> therefore <S%G2532><s%> perform <S%G2005><s%> the doing <S%G4160><s%> of it; that as there was a readiness <S%G4288><s%> to will, <S%G2309><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> there may be a performance <S%G2005><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> out of that which you have. <S%G2192><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> there be first <S%G4295><s%> a willing <S%G4288><s%> mind, <S%G4288><s%> it is accepted <S%G2144><s%> according <S%G2526><s%> to that a man <S%G5100><s%> has, <S%G2192><s%> and not according <S%G2526><s%> to that he has <S%G2192><s%> not.
For I mean not that other <S%G243><s%> men be eased, <S%G425><s%> and you burdened: <S%G2347><s%>

But by an equality, <S%G2471><s%> that now <S%G3568><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3568><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> abundance <S%G4051><s%> may be a supply for their want, <S%G5303><s%> that their abundance <S%G4051><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may be a supply for your <S%G5216><s%> want: <S%G5303><s%> that there may be equality: <S%G2471><s%>

As it is written, <S%G1125><s%> He that had gathered much <S%G4183><s%> had nothing <S%G3756><s%> over; <S%G4121><s%> and he that had gathered little <S%G3641><s%> had no <S%G3756><s%> lack. <S%G1641><s%>

But thanks <S%G5485><s%> be to God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> put <S%G1325><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> earnest <S%G4710><s%> care <S%G4710><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of Titus <S%G5103><s%> for you.

For indeed <S%G3303><s%> he accepted <S%G1209><s%> the exhortation; <S%G3874><s%> but being <S%G5225><s%> more <S%G4707><s%> forward, <S%G4707><s%> of his own <S%G830><s%> accord <S%G830><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> to you.

And we have sent <S%G4842><s%> with him the brother, <S%G80><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> is in the gospel <S%G2098><s%> throughout <S%G1223><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the churches; <S%G1577><s%>

And not that only, <S%G3440><s%> but who was also <S%G2532><s%> chosen <S%G5500><s%> of the churches <S%G1577><s%> to travel <S%G4898><s%> with us with this <S%G5124><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is administered <S%G1247><s%> by us to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the same <S%G3778><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and declaration of your <S%G5216><s%> ready <S%G4288><s%> mind: <S%G4288><s%>

Avoiding <S%G4724><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> should blame <S%G3469><s%> us in this <S%G5026><s%> abundance <S%G100><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is administered <S%G1247><s%> by us:

Providing <S%G4306><s%> for honest <S%G2570><s%> things, not only <S%G3440><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

And we have sent <S%G4842><s%> with them our brother, <S%G80><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have oftentimes <S%G4178><s%> proved <S%G1381><s%> diligent <S%G4705><s%> in many <S%G4183><s%> things, but now <S%G3570><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G4707><s%> diligent, <S%G4707><s%> on the great <S%G4183><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> I have in you.

Whether <S%G1535><s%> any do inquire of Titus, <S%G5103><s%> he is my partner <S%G2844><s%> and fellow helper <S%G4904><s%> concerning <S%G1519><s%> you: or <S%G1535><s%> our brothers <S%G80><s%> be inquired of, they are the messengers <S%G652><s%> of the churches, <S%G1577><s%> and the glory <S%G1391><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
